Text.Page: Eliminate the {@LinkCreature:5#4#Tuwangi Frogriders} so that the Tree Tuwangis gathered at the east of the swamp entrance on Moong's orders cannot attack.
We can assume that the majority of the problem will go away now that the Tree Tuwangi Frogriders are gone.
We don't have much time. Get rid of the {@LinkCreature:5#4#Tuwangi Frogriders} now.
